name: Striking and Counterattacks
description: Techniques for powerful strikes and effective counterattacks in close-quarters combat.

cards.title: Jab-Cross Combination
cards.description: Fundamental striking combination used to create openings and disrupt opponents.
cards.bulletpoints: Proper stance, speed, targeting vital points, follow-up strikes
cards.summaryText: Snap rapid jab-cross pairs that stay on-line, set up follow-up shots, and keep opponents reactive instead of dictating the exchange.

cards.title: Elbow and Knee Strikes
cards.description: Short-range powerful attacks used in clinch fighting.
cards.bulletpoints: Angle control, rapid execution, generating force from core
cards.summaryText: Own the clinch by carving sharp elbows, driving knees from the core, and managing angles so every close-range strike lands with fight-ending force.
